meanings.definition: A large organization or agency that has authority over smaller agencies or organizations.
meanings.sent1: The superagencies in charge of environmental protection ensure that all smaller agencies follow the rules.
meanings.sent2: The government established a superagencies to oversee the healthcare system.
meanings.sent3: The superagencies for animal welfare made sure every pet had a cozy bed to sleep in.
meanings.sent4: In the world of superheroes, the Justice League acts as a superagencies, keeping all other heroes in check.
meanings.sent5: The superagencies for space exploration led the mission to Mars with precision and expertise.

meanings.definition: The highest level of authority or power within a particular field or industry.
meanings.sent1: As the CEO of the company, she held the position of superagencies, making all major decisions.
meanings.sent2: The professor was considered the superagencies in the field of astrophysics.
meanings.sent3: The superagencies of fashion design showcased their latest collection at the prestigious event.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, the legendary artist was hailed as the superagencies of rock and roll.
meanings.sent5: The superagencies of technology unveiled their groundbreaking invention to the world.
